title: Moderna, Twitter, Kroger: Stocks That Defined the Week
sub_head: Here are seven major companies whose stocks moved on the weekâ€™s news
body:
Moderna Inc.
Omicron may give vaccine makers a shot in the arm. The prospect of new demand for booster shots, as well as medicines to treat disease caused by the new strain of Covid-19, has lifted the stock prices of Moderna and Pfizer Inc. Moderna said it is testing whether its Covid-19 vaccine is effective against the Omicron variant, while also developing a modified vaccine that specifically targets the variant. Moderna shares soared 12% Monday.
